title: Fitting an elephant with four non-zero parameters
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightblue];MainContent[label="Skip to main content
We gratefully acknowledge support from the Simons Foundation, member institutions, and all contributors.
Donate
math
arXiv:2407.07909
Help | Advanced Search"];Support[label="Support", style=dotted];Content[label="Content"];Paper[label="Fitting an Elephant with Four non-Zero Parameters
Dian Jin, Junze Yuan
In 1953, Enrico Fermi criticized Dyson's model by quoting Johnny von Neumann: 'With four parameters I can fit an elephant, and with five I can make him wiggle his trunk.' So far, there have been several attempts to fit an elephant using four parameters, but as the problem has not been well-defined, the current methods do not completely satisfy the requirements. This paper defines the problem and presents an attempt.
Subjects: History and Overview (math.HO)
Cite as: arXiv:2407.07909 [math.HO]
https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.2407.07909
Focus to learn more"];MainContent->Support[label="Acknowledges"];MainContent->Content[label="Contains"];Content->Paper[label="Describes"];}

title: Show HN: I built a Jeopardy game maker with buzzer support
dot:
digraph JeopardyGame{Jeopardy[label="Create and Host Your Own Custom Jeopardy Games" shape=box style=filled color=lightblue];Buzzer[label="Built-in Buzzer Support

Use your phone as a buzzer, or physical buttons mapped to keyboard keys." shape=box];Score[label="Automatic Score Keeping

Keeps track of each team's score automatically" shape=box];Controls[label="Effortless Host Controls

See the answer to every clue and know which team is selecting the next clue." shape=box];Customizable[label="Highly Customizable

Create custom categories and clues, including text, audio, images, and video." shape=box];Teams[label="How many teams can join my game?

There is no limit! However, we recommend no more than 10 teams." shape=box];Categories[label="Is there a way to have less than 6 categories?

Sure! Just leave the category title and clues blank for any columns." shape=box];CSV[label="Can I upload a CSV of clues and responses?

Yes. Download the example template, fill it out, and re-upload." shape=box];Responses[label="As host, how can I see the correct responses?

Log in on a different tab or device and select “Show answer“." shape=box];Jeopardy->Buzzer;Jeopardy->Score;Jeopardy->Controls;Jeopardy->Customizable;Jeopardy->Teams[style=dotted];Jeopardy->Categories[style=dotted];Jeopardy->CSV[style=dotted];Jeopardy->Responses[style=dotted];subgraph cluster_FAQ{label="Frequently Asked Questions";Teams;Categories;CSV;Responses;}}
